mapper.select: SELECT shopping_api_id as shoppingApiId, ingredient_id as ingredientId, shopping_api_title as shoppingApiTitle, shopping_api_price as shoppingApiPrice, shopping_api_store as shoppingApiStore, shopping_api_date as shoppingApiDate, shopping_api_link as shoppingApiLink FROM shopping_api WHERE ingredient_id = #{ingredientId} AND shopping_api_date = CURDATE() ORDER BY shopping_api_price LIMIT 5;
